distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update fixes the following security issue in icu:

    * CVE-2014-9654: insufficient size limit checks in regular expression
      compiler (bsc#917129)

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2014-9654
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-9654>
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The Regular Expressions package in International Components for Unicode (ICU) for C/C++ before 2014-12-03, as used in Google Chrome before 40.0.2214.91, calculates certain values without ensuring that they can be represented in a 24-bit field, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted string, a related issue to CVE-2014-7923.
notes.title: CVE description
